name: Disc Golf Challenge
description:
Have fun with this realistic 3D discgolf game and experience 3 fantastic courses with exciting challenges. This is discgolf the way it's meant to be played!

High Quality Graphics, sounds and Surroundings that bring passion to the game.

Smooth and easy touch controls. Fun & intuitive gameplay.

KEY FEATURES:

• Play 3 different courses. Seaside, Hills and Forest.
• Simple and intuitive control: Aim, press and swipe.
• Awesome 3d graphics.
• Realistic physics.
• Smooth follow the flying disc from the ground or in the air.
• In game overview map.
• Lots of options for best experience.
• Both left and right handed disc control.
• High Score Table for each course.
• Statistics.
• No In App Purchases.

Download the best discgolf experience on mobile – get Disc Golf Challenge NOW!
Created by ZombiSoft.
